description:
Devoted to advocating for victims of personal injury, Melaragno, Placidi & Parini serves people in Erie and Erie County, as well as throughout Western Pennsylvania. The attorneys at this law office combine more than 70 years of experience in matters that include the following:

  • Car, motorcycle and trucking accidents
  • Construction accidents
  • Birth and brain injuries
  • Slip-and-falls and animal bites
  • Medical malpractice and wrongful death
  • Product liability

This full-service law office has the ability to pursue any course of action. The team here has served as lead counsel on more than 150 jury trials. In countless other cases, they have negotiated significant awards on behalf of people who have suffered as the result of someone else's negligence.

One of the attorneys here formerly worked for an insurance company. This team has unique insight into the tactics providers often use in an attempt to shortchange people of the money owed to them. Due to their ability to recover compensation and provide personalized representation, these attorneys hold honors that include holding an Avvo "Superb" rating; being listed in the American Institute of Personal Injury Attorneys' Top 10; and being named to Super Lawyers list.

Melaragno, Placidi & Parini accepts credit cards and offers free initial consultations. The law office also handles bankruptcy, criminal defense, family law and immigration matters.

Melaragno, Placidi & Parini is a debt relief agency. The attorneys help people file for bankruptcy relief under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
